snippet: In Torun, Poland, the holiday cookie and its recipes are shrouded in mystery....
abstract: Torun, medieval city on Vistula River bank in Poland, is internationally known for its pierniki or gingerbread, popular Christmastime treat; fame has spawned museums, hands-on bakeries and debates among artisans and consumers on confection's ideal spice blend.
lead_paragraph: In Torun, Poland, the holiday cookie and its recipes are shrouded in mystery.

headline.main: A Gingerbread City Guards Its Secrets
headline.print_headline: A Gingerbread City Guards Its Spicy Secrets
